transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Hello. Ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Bharti madam aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan madam bolo.
Customer: Okay, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Aapne bola tha na aaj call karne ko. Main continuous call kar rahi hu lekin baat ho nahi pa rahi aap se. Ye catalog A to Z Enterprises. Aapne morning mujhe call kiya tha to bataya tha mujhe ek lead ke bare mein.
Customer: Haan madam aur ek aur lead hai. Abhi maine shaam mein kiya usne lekin call hi nahi receive kiya.
Executive: Actually receive ki baat nahi jab wo receive kare aur bole ki meri requirement nahi hai. Maine.
Customer: Haan wahi isliye to main.
Executive: Isliye to main shaam mein isliye maine aapko bheja hai uski details. Lekin koi nahi. Wo waise leads mujhe bhejiye ga jab four-five leads mere paas ho jayenge na to main khud hi escalate karungi usko buylead escalate karungi. Theek hai? Isliye na ki kal jo humne baat kiya tha aap se ki catalog mein product ki photos ek-ek hi photo updated thi. Maine teen-teen, char-char photo upload kar diye catalog pe.
Customer: Ya.
Executive: Theek hai? To isse kya hua hai ki catalog ka quality score aapka improve hua hai. Pehle catalog ka quality score lower side tha. Abhi uska quality score badha hai kyunki product ki teen-teen, char-char photo update ki hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: To wo cheez hai. Baki wo video ka jo humne aapko features bataya tha video aapne upload kiya?
Customer: Eh madam thoda sa busy hu main aapko kal se hai na contact hu. Uh theek hai fir main wo morning mein kal baat karte hai. Sunday ko office rehta hai aapka?
Executive: Uh theek hai fir main wo morning mein kal baat karte hai. Sunday ko office rehta hai aapka?
Customer: No. No no sir Sunday ko baat karenge.
Executive: Monday ko. Haan actually thoda abhi main thoda samjhi hai kya urgent PIA se jana hai na iske liye wahi kar rahi hu.
Customer: Nahi koi baat nahi. Main Monday karti hu. Main ye keh rahi hu ticket main aapki fir close kar deti hu jo aapne ek buylead ka kiya tha. Theek hai? Maine usko solution aapko diya ki aap mujhe bhejiye fir main aage escalate karungi. Theek hai? Mujhe WhatsApp pe message dal dijiye. Baki fir main ticket close kar du na?
Executive: Chalo madam.
Customer: Theek hai? Lekin aap record aap ek sath mention karke bhejna aage. Theek hai? Kaise?
Executive: Lekin aap record aap ek sath mention karke bhejna aage. Theek hai? Kaise?
Customer: Haan bilkul aap mujhe bhejiye main buylead mein aage bhejungi usko isliye to main aap se keh rahi hu. Theek hai?
Executive: Okay. Thank you. Okay. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had an issue with buyleads.

- Customer updated product photos in catalog.

- Customer is busy and wants to postpone discussion.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to escalate buyleads if sent.

- Executive explained catalog quality score improvement.

- Executive agreed to close the buylead ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, quality score, ticket closure
